summary: The Clean Energy Victory Bond Act of 2025 proposes the issuance of Clean Energy Victory Bonds by the Secretary of the Treasury to fund clean energy projects at federal, state, and local levels. Proceeds will be used for energy efficiency upgrades, renewable energy deployment, electric grid enhancements, building renovations, tax incentives, research and development, and zero-emission vehicle infrastructure. The bill aims to combat climate change, create jobs, and improve energy security. A Clean Energy Victory Bonds Trust Fund would be established to manage the funds, with a focus on supporting projects in disadvantaged communities.
